subject: Roblox Password Reset Request: yxvdjmk
body:

IMPORTANT: Don't share your security codes with anyone. Roblox will never ask you for your codes. This can include things like texting your code, screensharing, etc. By sharing your security codes with someone else, you are putting your account and its content at high risk.


Thank You,
The Roblox Team

Do not reply to this email directly. You are receiving this email because an attempt was made to reset your password. Learn More | Account Safety | Support
